questions.question: What is the predominant color of the container holding the product?
What is the primary shape of the container?
What material appears to constitute the primary container?
What is the apparent texture of the container's surface?
What color are the individual product packets visible inside?
What appears to be the overall shape of the individual product packets?
What kind of label is affixed to the container, conveying essential information?
What is the background color of the main cautionary label on the container?
What is the color of the text on the primary cautionary label?
What color is the small accent band at the top of the container?
Does the container feature a tamper-evident seal or closure?
Are there any discernible markings or symbols on the individual product packets?
What is the apparent size or scale of the container relative to a typical hand?
Is the text on the label primarily in uppercase or lowercase?
Are there any noticeable graphics or illustrations on the label aside from warning symbols?
